short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connects the Recap web app directly to your crypto exchanges and services, protecting your financial privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By directly connecting the Recap web app to your crypto exchanges and services, your data does not flow through our servers, preventing Recap (or anyone else), from snooping on or stealing your financial data.

The source code for the extension can be found here: https://github.com/recap-tech/extension-source
